,028 2,116 2,608 7,752 Jul 5,955 4,376 4,050 14,381 Aug 4,205 3,550 3,645 11,400 Sep 5,051 4,419 3,221 12,691 Oct 3,221 2,953 2,067 8,241 Nov 2,712 2,205 2,137 7,054 Dec 3,046 2,279 2,211 7,536 Total 1943 36,377 26,658 26,234 89,269 1944 Jan 7,193 3,004 3,200 13,397 Feb 5,905 2,360 2,170 10,435 Mar 9,954 2,795 2,911 15,660 Apr 18,598 3,019 4,518 26,135 May 27,015 4,299 5,434 36,748 Jun 26,147 4,744 5,568 36,459 Jul 29,373 4,573 5,989 39,935 Aug 30,621 5,031 7,199 42,851 Sep 25,244 4,239 4,748 34,231 Oct 22,570 2,934 3,884 29,388 Nov 23,864 3,447 4,598 31,909 Dec 23,550 2,321 5,316 31,187 Total 1944 250,034 42,766 55,535 348,335 1945 Jan 12,724 1,976 3,941 18,641 Feb 32,574 2,774 4,990 40,338 Mar 37,657 3,170 6,664 47,491 Apr 37,533 3,361 7,188 48,082 May 8,481 1,271 1,746 11,498 Total 1945 128,969 12,552 24,529 166,050 Grand Total 416,328 82,592 106,909 605,829   ## p. 670 (#694) ############################################    ## p. 671 (#695) ############################################  Appendix 30 Expenditures from Direct Appropriations by Major Project July 1942 to August 1945 (thousands of dollars; figures in parenthesis are negative) Procurement Aircraft and Spares Missiles Balloons Gliders Aircraft Night Sight Modification Systems 1942 Jul 254,240 707 1,363 85 Aug 436,098 4,637 1,483 31 Sep 398,330 2,367 4,851 153 Oct 445,727 7,470 3,449 52 Nov 208,225 4,014 2,554 (15) Dec 432,132 15,151 10,220 194 Total 1942 2,174,752 34,346 23,920 500 1943 Jan 824,772 17,696 5,210 73 Feb 671,574 10,670 4,086 55 Mar 791,800 16,092 8,835 64 Apr 558,878 8,409 6,551 (29) May 686,222 13,897 5,571 10 Jun 1,192,623 15,061 18,245 3,161 1,786 Jul 659,938 809 13,694 2,367 47 Aug 744,523 7,557 12,698 3,023 (13) Sep 737,753 4,815 13,542 3,327 89 Oct 786,339 6,459 10,215 4,525 76 Nov 832,252 3,499 16,554 2,079 175 Dec 880,520 2,573 13,936 2,637 172 Total 1943 9,367,194 40,773 165,648 51,372 2,505 1944 Jan 789,342 2,963 14,521 5,834 485 Feb 692,131 1,431 12,641 9,782 175 Mar 966,739 461
